settings.content: [Responsive documentation](http://support.outofthesandbox.com) and [Timber documentation](http://shopify.github.io/Timber/) can be referred to for help.

settings.label: Product Enquiry Link
settings.info: Page that product enquiry links to.

settings.content: Commerce mode enables purchasing and cart. Brochure mode disables purchasing and cart. Enquiries mode disables purchasing and cart (but adds product enquiry link).

settings.label: Custom logo
settings.info: Maximum logo dimensions are 450px wide by 200px high. The uploaded file will be resized to fit within those constraints.

settings.label: Max logo width
settings.info: Defined in pixels. Do not add the 'px' unit.

settings.label: Primary
settings.info: Used for text links, and primary buttons

settings.content: Use class="color" on an input tag to bring up the color picker. Only a few colors have been included here as an example.

settings.label: Order of features
settings.info: Example: S-P-C-L-M. If this field is left blank, your header will be empty.

settings.label: Order of features
settings.info: Example: 1-2-S-T-N. If this field is left blank, your footer will be empty.

settings.label: MailChimp Form Action URL
settings.info: [Where do I find my MailChimp form action URL?](http://docs.shopify.com/support/configuration/store-customization/where-do-i-get-my-mailchimp-form-action)

settings.content: Note: To setup a team profile, set the page template to page.person (optionally add profile image) and save. Done.
Note: To setup a gallery, add images to a page, set the page template to page.gallery and save. Done.

options.value: 'Lucida Grande', 'Lucida Sans Unicode', 'Lucida Sans', Lucida, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

options.label: Georgia

settings.label: Order of features
settings.info: Example: W-P-C-B. If this field is left blank, your home page will be empty.
